Package cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models

Interface IGameBoard

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbsGameBoard, GameBoard, GameBoardMem
public interface IGameBoard
Game board that represents a 2-dimensional game board used to play extendedConnectX. Bottom left corner of game board is of index (0,0)

  • Method Details

    • checkIfFree

      default boolean checkIfFree(int c)
      Checks if a specified column is free by checking if the top row of the column is empty (' ')
      Parameters:
      c - is the int representing the column index
      Returns:
      true IFF the top row of the column does not contain some token (' '), false OW

    • dropToken

      void dropToken(char p, int c)
      Allows a player to drop a token into a specific column, placing it at the lowest available row
      Parameters:
      p - the character representing player's token to be dropped in the column
      c - the index for the column in which the player wants to drop their token

    • checkForWin

      default boolean checkForWin(int c)
      Checks if a player has won the game based on the most recent marker in a specified column
      Parameters:
      c - the index of the column in which the last token was placed
      Returns:
      true IFF a player wins the game with a vertical, horizontal, or diagonal sequence of number_to_win char p's, false OW

    • checkTie

      default boolean checkTie()
      Checks if the game board is completely full and the game has ended in a tie
      Returns:
      true IFF the game board is completely full and game has ended in a tie, false ow

    • checkHorizWin

      default boolean checkHorizWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      Checks for a win resulting from a horizontal sequence of number_to_win tokens by a given player starting at a given position.
      Parameters:
      pos - position of the token that was just dropped
      p - player who dropped the most recent token
      Returns:
      true IFF if the last token by player p results in a horizontal streak of number_to_win tokens, false OW

    • checkVertWin

      default boolean checkVertWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      Checks for a win resulting from a vertical sequence of number_to_win tokens by a given player starting at a given position.
      Parameters:
      pos - position of the token that was just dropped
      p - player who dropped the most recent token
      Returns:
      true IFF if the last token by player p results in a vertical streak of number_to_win tokens, false OW

    • checkDiagWin

      default boolean checkDiagWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      Checks for a win resulting from a diagonal sequence of number_to_win tokens by a given player starting at a given position.
      Parameters:
      pos - position of the token that was just dropped
      p - player who dropped the most recent token
      Returns:
      true IFF if the last token by player p results in a diagonal streak of number_to_win tokens, false OW

    • whatsAtPos

      char whatsAtPos(BoardPosition pos)
      Checks and returns the char marker of the player at a given BoardPosition, or a ' ' if that position is empty
      Parameters:
      pos - the desired BoardPosition to get the marker of
      Returns:
      the marker of the player at the specified BoardPosition as a char IFF there is one, OW returns ' '

    • isPlayerAtPos

      default boolean isPlayerAtPos(BoardPosition pos, char player)
      Checks if a particular player token is at a particular position on board
      Parameters:
      pos - the BoardPosition of the most recent token placed
      player - the char token expected at pos
      Returns:
      true IFF player char is located on board at BoardPosition pos, false OW
